DOC.brief_summary: To compare, in patients with advanced pancreatic cancer, the effects of IMM-101 in combination with gemcitabine to gemcitabine alone on safety and tolerability (including QoL), clinical signs and symptoms of disease, selected markers of tumour burden and immunological status, and disease outcome.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Gemcitabine With and Without IMM-101 in Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
